title: ArtViva
text: Artviva School's all-in-one online solution, seamlessly integrating tuition payments, application submissions, and informative pages.

Powered by React and Node.js, this comprehensive web platform offers a holistic experience, enhanced by Google Analytics insights. Experience convenience, functionality, and a captivating user interface, all within Artviva School's integrated digital hub.
description: Children's art school website and custom backend used to handle school tuition fees using LiqPay API. Frontend for ArtViva school. Client side form validation is done using Formik and Yup. Integrated google maps with the list of all school departments. School facebook group on a separate page. Parents can pay tuition fees directly from the site using liqpay.

title: huma.com
text: Telemedicine company. Frontend, form handling, page templates and reusable components. Webpack v5 setup tuned for performance.
description: Telemedicine company. Frontend, form handling, page templates and reusable components. Webpack v5 setup tuned for performance.

title: Sharlushka
text: Famous dice game from the previous century. Also called 'Yahtzee'. Build using Vue to test some things out, I would like to redo this using React someday ;)
description: Famous dice game from the previous century. Also called 'Yahtzee'. Build using Vue to test some things out, I would like to redo this using React someday ;)

title: maxdog.com.ua
